value.title: Move Measures to Another Table in Power BI
value.excerpt: The ability to move measures from one table to another table exists in Power BI, However, the process is not familiar for many users. Through my consulting and training work I have explained it to many of my clients. The process is simple and much better than re-creating the measure again and deleting

value.title: One Dimension Filters Another Dimension in Power BI
value.excerpt: I often get this question after I explain about the star-schema. value.title: Power BI Quick Tip: the Formula Bar in Power Query

value.title: TOPN DAX Function   How it works in Power BI   Comparison against the top group

value.excerpt: Turning columns to rows or rows to columns is easy with Power Query and Power BI. There are many situations that you get a name, value data source, and wants to convert that into columns with values underneath. On the other hand, many times you get multiple columns and want to change it to name, value

value.title: What is Premium Per User License for Power BI, and What is it good for
value.excerpt: One of the great news in Microsoft Ignite 2020 is the announcement of a new licensing plan for Microsoft Power BI, called Premium Per User, or Premium Gen2. In this article, I'll explain what that is, and how this can be helpful for Power BI users. Read my article here to find links to study more: https://radacad.com/what-is-premium-per-user-license-for-power-bi-and-what-is-it-good-for

value.title: Apply AND Logic to Multiple Selection in DAX Slicer
value.excerpt: When you apply a multiple selection to a slicer or to a filter, you obtain a logical OR condition between selected items. This video shows how to implement a logical AND condition in a measure instead of the standard OR one. Article and download: https://sql.bi/26121?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/tONOosN1xAs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Connecting Excel to Power BI Desktop using DAX Studio
value.excerpt: You can connect Excel to Power BI Desktop copying the connection string from Power BI Desktop. Useful to test your model for Excel consumption before publishing to Power BI service.

value.title: Distinguishing HASONEVALUE from ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: This video describes the differences between HASONEVALUE and ISINSCOPE, which are two useful DAX functions to control the filters and the grouping that are active in a report. Article and download: https://sql.bi/662962?aff=yt

value.title: Highlighting the minimum and maximum values in a Power BI matrix
value.excerpt: This video shows how to use DAX and conditional formatting together to highlight the minimum and maximum values in a matrix in Power BI. Article and download: https://sql.bi/662096?aff=yt

value.title: How to debug a DAX measure
value.excerpt: Use DAX Studio to run and debug a DAX measure: fix a calculation issue in a more productive environment and then copy the right formula back in Power BI. value.title: Introducing Performance Analyzer in Power BI Desktop

value.title: Mark as Date Table in Power BI
value.excerpt: Tabular models (including Power BI) require marking the Date table as a date table to get appropriate results with time intelligence calculations. This video explains why this setting is required. Article and download: https://sql.bi/670749
